keyMoments.title: Luffy Fights Dorry to Defend His Crew's Honor
keyMoments.description: When Dorry suspects the Straw Hats of sabotaging his rum, Luffy is forced to fight the injured giant to prove his crew's innocence and honor.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's unwavering trust in his crew and his refusal to accept false accusations, even when facing a giant.
keyMoments.quote: I know Brogy would never do something so cowardly, and neither would any of my crew!

keyMoments.title: Luffy Defeats the Weakened Dorry
keyMoments.description: Luffy successfully knocks out Dorry, though the victory is hollow given the giant's severe injuries from the explosive rum.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Luffy's combat prowess while highlighting that this isn't a fair or honorable victory.

keyMoments.title: Luffy's Rage at the Violation of Sacred Combat
keyMoments.description: Luffy becomes furious upon realizing that someone has violated the giants' sacred duel with underhanded tactics, deducing that a third party must be on the island.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases Luffy's core values regarding honor in combat and his respect for warriors who fight fairly.
keyMoments.quote: Someone else is on this island! Someone who doesn't respect the giants' sacred fight!

relationships.description: Despite being forced to fight Dorry, Luffy trusts that the giant would never use dirty tactics and becomes angry on his behalf when the sacred duel is violated.

evolutionMoments.description: Luffy defends Dorry's honor by refusing to believe he sabotaged the rum, even while fighting him.

keyMoments.title: Dorry Drinks Explosive Rum
keyMoments.description: Dorry drinks rum that was sabotaged by Mr. 3 with explosives, causing it to detonate inside him and inflict severe internal injuries.
keyMoments.significance: This is the central incident that drives the episode's conflict and reveals the underhanded tactics of Baroque Works.

keyMoments.title: Dorry Suspects the Straw Hat Pirates
keyMoments.description: After the explosion, Dorry confronts Luffy and Vivi, believing they are responsible for sabotaging the rum since he trusts that Brogy would never do such a thing.
keyMoments.significance: Creates a conflict between Dorry and the Straw Hats based on a misunderstanding orchestrated by Mr. 3.
keyMoments.quote: You are the only ones who could have done this!

keyMoments.title: Dorry Defeated by Luffy
keyMoments.description: Despite his immense size and strength, Dorry is defeated by Luffy due to his severe injuries from the explosive rum.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates how Mr. 3's sabotage successfully weakened one of the island's most powerful warriors.

relationships.description: Dorry and Brogy have been locked in a century-long sacred duel, but maintain deep respect for each other's honor as warriors.

evolutionMoments.description: Dorry refuses to believe Brogy would sabotage their duel, showing his trust in his rival's honor.

keyMoments.title: Latest Duel with Dorry Ends in Draw
keyMoments.description: Brogy and Dorry's latest battle ends in another draw, continuing their century-long stalemate.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the ongoing nature of their sacred duel before it is disrupted by Mr. 3's sabotage.

keyMoments.title: Usopp Calls Brogy 'Master'
keyMoments.description: Usopp shows deep respect for Brogy's warrior spirit and begins referring to him as 'Master', inspired by the giant's honor and strength.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the beginning of Usopp's admiration for the warriors of Elbaf and his dream to visit the giants' homeland.

relationships.description: Brogy becomes an inspiration and mentor figure to Usopp, teaching him about warrior's pride and honor.

evolutionMoments.description: Usopp begins calling Brogy 'Master' and shows deep admiration for his warrior spirit.

keyMoments.title: Usopp Expresses Interest in Visiting Elbaf
keyMoments.description: Inspired by Brogy's warrior spirit, Usopp expresses fascination with the giants and their homeland of Elbaf, planting the seeds of a long-term dream.
keyMoments.significance: This is the origin of Usopp's dream to visit Elbaf, which becomes a recurring goal throughout the entire series and is fulfilled over 1000 episodes later.

reveals.information: Usopp expresses his desire to visit Elbaf and learn from the warriors there

relationships.description: Usopp looks up to Brogy as a master warrior and role model, inspired by his honor and fighting spirit.

evolutionMoments.description: Usopp begins calling Brogy 'Master' and expresses his dream to visit Elbaf.

keyMoments.title: Mr. 3 Sabotages Dorry's Rum with Explosives
keyMoments.description: Mr. 3 orchestrates a scheme to eliminate the giants by sabotaging rum barrels with explosives, causing one to detonate inside Dorry when he drinks it.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Mr. 3's cunning and strategic approach, using deception rather than direct confrontation to defeat powerful enemies.

keyMoments.title: Mr. 3's Scheme Revealed to Viewers
keyMoments.description: The audience learns that Mr. 3 was responsible for the explosive rum, revealing his plan to eliminate both the giants and the Straw Hat Pirates through underhanded tactics.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Mr. 3 as a cunning antagonist and sets up the upcoming confrontation with the Straw Hats.

keyMoments.title: Vivi Confronted by Dorry
keyMoments.description: Vivi is present when Dorry confronts the Straw Hats about the sabotaged rum, witnessing the breakdown of trust between the giant and the crew.
keyMoments.significance: Places Vivi in a tense situation where she must stand with her allies despite being accused by a powerful giant.

keyMoments.title: Nami Provides Rum to Brogy
keyMoments.description: Nami (along with Usopp) provides rum barrels to Brogy as a gesture of hospitality, unknowingly giving him the sabotaged barrels that will be used to injure Dorry.
keyMoments.significance: Shows how Mr. 3 manipulated the Straw Hats' kindness to execute his scheme.

name.japanese: ミス・ゴールデンウィーク

keyMoments.title: Miss Goldenweek Assists Mr. 3's Scheme
keyMoments.description: Miss Goldenweek is present with Mr. 3 as his scheme to sabotage the giants' duel unfolds.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes her role as Mr. 3's partner in the Baroque Works operation on Little Garden.
